website_summaries.verdict: While it may not eliminate all issues, it is a top-selling enzymatic cleaner that impresses most pet owners who use it.
pros: Effective and safe – while it neutralizes odors and stains, it's also safe to use around animals and on flooring
Customers refer to the results as "amazing."
cons: Some users don't like the smell, and others report their pets returning to the same area even after treated

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I was not impressed with this product. I had high hopes considering how expensive it is. I have fake grass in the backyard and one dog. I was hoping that it will help with the urine smell. It did help temporarily but by the next day when the sun hit the grass it smelled like urine again. I tried it a couple times. Unfortunately I was not impressed. However if you’re interested I tried vinegar with some essential oil‘s to make it smell better and the effects lasted much longer. And it’s much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertized
customer_reviews.text: The other product I use is Anti Icky poo (which works great at smell removal). Both products use an enzyme to eliminate the smell. The advantage of this product is it also has cleaning properties (detergent) so if you are interested in not only getting rid of the smell, but ALSO cleaning the surface (carpet in my case) to eliminate a stain this fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Master of the Universe

customer_reviews.title: Love This Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs. One dog has an ambulation issue and has a hard time walking on hardwood floors. He has a series of carpet runners that lead to the doors in our house and sometimes has small accidents as he makes his way outside. I also have a geriatric chihuahua and a black lab puppy. It's a lot to manage, but I love these animals. This product facilitates the clean-up process when one of the pooches has an accident. It is the best product I have found so far for eliminating urine odor. Yes, it's pricey, but it's worth every penny. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: marn p

customer_reviews.title: A must buy if you have cats
customer_reviews.text: I can not recommend this product enough. And I was overjoyed to find it in a huge bottle. We have cats and hair balls and white carpet - not a good combination until I found this spray. We also have a cat that urinates in strange places like the baseboard - once again Rocco and Roxie to the rescue. When our cats have left hair balls and/or urinated on clothes, sheets and comforters I have also used this spray to clean those items first before washing. This is the only spray I have found that eliminates the smell completely from everything.
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: 10x better than competition
customer_reviews.text: I was previously using nature's miracle advanced for dog urine and let me tell you there is no comparison! This stuff works great. The other brand I used was very fragrant and tried to eliminate and mask the smell. This product has kind of an essential oil smell resembling cinnamon or something and eliminates the smell much much better. We had soft case bag that our cat had peed on and then our dogs peed on as well to mark their territory because the cat. The other brand worked maybe 50% at best. This stuff worked amazing. I had to retreat it for a second time to fully get everything out but it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Kade

customer_reviews.title: Great, unless you own a black light
customer_reviews.text: This product has a decent scent (smells like bubble gum), and I’ve used it to clean both cat and human (yes) urine with good success. I’m skeptical, however, because the cat urine stains still show up under the black light. I was under the impression that the proteins in the urine are what show up under the black light, and using these types of cleaners would get rid of that. However, I’m no expert, so maybe I’m wrong? If you don’t have a black light, I doubt you’d notice anything was askew, which is probably the most important thing to most people.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great for both old and new urine stains
customer_reviews.text: We have used this on both old and new urine stains. We thought we had taken care of old stains with vinegar/water mix and even with a rub scrubber but the smell would come back. We soaked the carpet area where the smell was coming from and it went away. Since then we use it for spot treatment when someone misses the pee pad. Used on both cat and dog urine stains. Remarkable the difference and how it helps stop remarking. Used as a deterrent outside for stray cat marking - of course washes away with rain and fades over time, but does lessen reoccurrences. So happy we found this product.
customer_reviews.author: richard donia

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible on its own
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this works as well as other enzymatic cleaners and it has a horrific scent that may overpower what its trying to clean, but is terrible in its own right. I find the scent the worst part of the product. It rivals the worst a dog could do and gives me a headache. I’ve used this exclusively on a wool carpet and can’t say it works all that well since there’s still a slight discoloration and the odor reappears if it gets wet. This may work well for some, but not for me. If you’re one of those people, there’s a most mostly unused 1 gallon jug on my porch for the taking.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I have tried many things
customer_reviews.text: I bet I have 6 to 7 different pet cleaning products I have tried. My cat when through an anxiety stage when a cat attacked her through our window screen . Thankfully that is over.I could not find a product those 3 months, cleaning the carpet and even having the carpet professionally cleaned and nothing worked as good as this. I recently acquired a puppy and we have used it on her accidents and it is positively the best with stains and odors. I will not look for another product , I am completely satisfied with this one
customer_reviews.author: L. Gerde

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for neutralizing cat pee odor
customer_reviews.text: I have an 18 year old cat that has more accidents than would be ideal. I buy this stuff by the gallon. I now keep a water proof thing on my mattress but before I realized I needed that, I used this to douse my mattress to get rid of the smell and it did. Same on carpet. The key is just making sure you find where the smell happened and soaking it all the way through. I've also used it to soak a backpack that got peed on and then washed it and it was usable again. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Smells worse than the minor dog odor I wanted to eliminate :-(
customer_reviews.text: I was ready to love this product, but its nauseating, unbelievably strong, sickly-sweet odor was (way) worse than the dog smell I wanted to eliminate. I am surprised that there is no indication on the bottle that the scent is so darn overwhelming. I am in the process of returning it and will go back to Febreeze.
customer_reviews.author: AHDoehler

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker! Sincerely the cat lady!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I did not believe that this product would work despite seeing the feedback. However, this product should be titled “miracle worker”! I have five cats and two dogs in my home and The latest addition (#5) has caused some turmoil and one of my female cats started peeing on my furniture and my bed. I used the product with instant results. I was able to add it to laundry and was able to get the smell out first time around without even having to soak The items in the tub. I am completely flabbergasted with the results. I would encourage anyone who is skeptical to try, immediate and satisfying results!
customer_reviews.author: Laila Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Best Stuff We Found. 6 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a spray bottle size when we got our first dog. The stuff works great cleaning dog pee and we have never had an issue with the smell of dog in the home, even after getting our 2nd dog and potty training. When we ran out we order the gallon size, which goes a long way. We just had 2 litters, 14 puppies, and when people came to see the dogs they commented on how nice our home smelled, considering how many puppies we had. Would give this a 6th star if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!! A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I was having difficulty in getting the cat urine odor out of my couch permanently. I had tried several other over urine odor eliminator products however this one is definitely a winner!!! It has a smell sort of like ginger when letting the solution sit and permeate through my couch. I'd recommend using a towel to cover the areas that have been marked with the cat urine and letting the solution sit to truly get the stain and odor OUT! It cost 52$ for this stuff but it definitely works! My cat has NOT been back to repeat the inappropriate urination on my couch anymore!
customer_reviews.author: cutiepie

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd bottle. Since there are enzymes, the bottle needs to be at a certain temperature for the enzymes to not be "killed". I forgot the actual term for it lol. Who knows how hot the warehouse was or the delivery trucks while en route. You're better off soaking the carpeted area with water and extracting the water (along with cat urine) with a carpet cleaner wet vacuum FOUR times to get as much urine as possible then soaking the area with PineSol, let it dry. The cats sniff over the previous affected area and walk away as if they didn't detect anything on that spot
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works
customer_reviews.text: Imagine a cat pee smell so strong it made you wince. And it was everywhere. I tried to save the wall to wall carpeting with a professional cleaning but that didn't work. So, in desperation, I tried this. First, I had to remove the carpets and pads. It was tedious but that got rid of about 50% of the smell. Next, I used R&R Professional Strength Stain and Odor Eliminator. At about $55 a gallon, it wasn't cheap, but I sprayed the floor when the cat did her business and after three or four applications, the smell was gone So thank you for that.
customer_reviews.author: Copyboy

customer_reviews.title: The BEST cat urine odor eliminator.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product for cat urine odor removal. I've tried all the others, and most, like Nature's Miracle, replace one unpleasant scent with another. Rocco &Roxie is awesome for spot treating and can even be added to laundry. I have an ill cat who has urinary incontinence and after reading online reviews I decided to give this a try. I bought a small spray bottle, and later bought the gallon. It's pricey but it works. So far for my furnitureand carpeting it is color safe. This won't mask the odor, it will eradicate it completely and leave behind a pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Dead RAT NO MORE!
customer_reviews.text: A rat made a nest in my brand new running shoe and died over the winter. The smell was nauseating. Before tossing them out, I decided to try out this product. Worked 100%. NO TRACE of any odor. Amazing product. I was skeptical but this worked. Soaked the shoe for 24 hours. Then washed and dried the shoe in the sun. It’s like it never happened.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond R

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Pee Pee!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried everything out there to remove urine and the smell from our carpet and furniture. I have a 12 year old male Bichon that has had a "marking" problem for the last few years. This has to be the best at what it claims to do out of everything that I've purchased in the past. Is it perfect? No. Does my house or furniture smell like pee after using it? No. It's spends but you don't have to use a lot and it's cheaper than buying new furniture or carpet.
customer_reviews.author: momof3dogsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cat urine, leather couch
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat with bowel issues. She peed on my leather couch, and as anyone with cats knows, if they pee in a spot once, they're bound to pee there again. I tried biokleen first because it's supposed to be safe for leather. Multiple treatments were unsuccessful. This stuff took two treatments, but the urine smell is completely gone and there is no damage or discoloration to the leather. The cat has not peed on the couch since. There is a slight residual smell from the cleaner, but it's mild, and I actually think the cleaner smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Cadley

customer_reviews.title: This WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Not only is it good for pet accidents, but someone had spilt raspberry sauce all over my brand new white tablecloth. I thought "oh well, that's a gonna", and applied some Rocco & Roxie, and carried on clearing the table. As I was back and forth from table to dishwasher, I noticed the raspberry vanishing before my eyes. Saved my tablecloth. We had originally bought the smaller spray bottle of it, but then bought this large bottle, so we always have it on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: So long as I have pets, I will continue to purchase this product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product years ago due to having a special needs kitty and had us cleaning up after her all the time. I only purchased the smaller spray bottle back then. Since I knew it worked, this time I just purchased the gallon sized bottle. I can say that it works effectively for dogs and cats. We recently brought home a puppy and we’re housebreaking him, and it’s great to know I have a product that works and smells good. It works better than any other cleaner I’ve purchased (and believe me, I purchased A LOT throughout my cat’s 13 year life).
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Negron

customer_reviews.title: Works Amazingly
customer_reviews.text: I’m remodeling a house where the garage was rat infested. After emptying the junk out and sweeping it clean I filled a 1 gallon sprayer with this stuff and sprayed EVERYTHING, walls, cement floor, doors etc. I coated the entire inside of garage. Let it dry and two days later there is no way you can tell anything was wrong. I’ve since used it for its intended purpose of cleaning up a sick dog’s accident and again it worked wonders. I love the scent while using it and when it dries it leaves behind a fresh scent. Way better than smelling urine or vomit! I won’t be without a bottle of this.
customer_reviews.author: deb92284

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I had a cat at the end stage of renal failure and thought I was going to have to replace carpet (and wood). Because I had to use so much product, I felt like the odor was going to eat my lungs out. The product along with the quantity of urine was unbearable. HOWEVER, after the carpeting dried, the foul smell was gone and a fresh (kind of light cinnamon(?) fragrance left my house smelling fresh. I have a nose like a beagle. This stuff is truly amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Helped with Oder but not stains
customer_reviews.text: I had mixed results. I used a pump sprayer to spray the carpet that was heavily soiled with dog urine. I let it sit over night. The scent of the product was very strong, but I used a lot of product. It seemed to leave residue on the carpet even after vacuuming the next day, so I used a carpet cleaning machine over the whole area. Between the product and the carpet cleaning the urine oder was gone and the scent from the product was barely noticed by the next day. I was less impressed with the stain removal. It didn’t seem to help much and under the UV light the stains are still very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: Gone without a trace!
customer_reviews.text: My dear old cat had serious digestive issues for several years so he would vomit a bit. I tried quite a few different cleaners. Then I happened to get a special flashlight. I was HORRIFIED at all the stains!!! This Rocco & Roxie enzyme-powered stuff WORKS to remove the entire stain!! Nothing else I tried did it. Get yourself an inexpensive blacklight LED flashlight and really get rid of stains you can't otherwise see!
customer_reviews.author: island girl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love my hellcat, he is a devil and when his litterbox goes one day over the scheduled cleaning time, he peed on my new $$ corduroy sofa.$$ He is a furry terrorist. Luckily the foam core can be washed. I would massage another urine destroyer into the foam and hope for the best. Still smelled like evil cat pee AND the cleaning solution. Not good at all. I used a gallon of Rocco & Roxie, the scent was minty, and it DID do away with the smell. I didn't diluted it, just pored it on like a monster. The couch does NOT smell like Pee! Pee! Huzzah!
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed
customer_reviews.text: We have two cats, a dog and a one year old...needless to say I need to keep the carpets clean and the cats done make it easy. The one cat has epilepsy and since being put on the medicine she seems to forget that we have four litter boxes! The other cat is 19 and extremely territorial...she’s spraying everywhere. We used Stanley steamer and it didn’t help. This stuff however m, I can not smell the cat urine smell anymore...it’s incredible! Days later I take the black light over and the stain is so light I can barely see it, it really does a great job! It’s expensive but it won’t disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: This product is MAGIC and worth every penny. I had some old urine stains and I had tried a million cleaners to get rid of it with nothing working. The best method to use this cleaner is to saturate the entire affected area with undiluted cleaner evenly and then saturate a towel with water and ring out the excess water. Lay the towel on the affected area for a few hours or even overnight. The pee will be lifted into the towel and the carpet will no longer have a smell or stain. Truly amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I had a milk spill in the (brand new) car that I wasn't aware of for a week. When I opened the car a week after the spill occurred, it smelled like a dead animal decomposing. It was terrible. One could not sit in a car without gagging. The milk went in between the seat cushions, in areas almost impossible to reach. I have worked with this product for about a week on stench removal. And it eventually worked. The smell was 100% gone. It is an absolutely incredible product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Our front porch stray became an indoor boy after surgery (and permanently thereafter). Unfortunately, he held his urine all day and post-surgery and saved it for the corner of our sofa. He soiled a pretty large area so I knew I needed something industrial strength to remove this seriously pungent odor. Read reviews, came upon this, ordered it. Followed the instructions to the letter and washed a few things with it added to the wash. Unfortunately, my sofa still stinks to high heavens. I don't know what we're going to do. We had this product applied and treating the sofa within two days of it happening, so it wasn't even an old set-in odor.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent on old wood floors.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product we’ve ever used over the last 20 years of dog ownership. We’ve always had a problem getting the smell out of our old wood plant hallway. With the wood plank separating most products just touch the surface. I used about two cups of product with two cups of warm water. I then spread it liberally over the areas with a wet mop. After it dries up in the cracks (overnight) the smell was completely gone! Best ever! Hands down.
customer_reviews.author: T. Soczka

customer_reviews.title: It works! Best stain & odor remover
customer_reviews.text: Best yet in removing ANY organic stains and odors, ESPECIALLY old ones. I follow the simple directions, protect stains from foot traffic with a paper towel/plastic open weave basket, and let them dry. *POOF!* Stains are gone and carpet completely clean. It worked on porcelain tile, grout lines, wood, and clothes with red pasta sauce stains. (We have the sweetest female cat who stubbornly pees+ over any "unpleasant" smell she finds. She doesn't visit the cleaned areas again.)
customer_reviews.author: notfromhere

customer_reviews.title: The best. Don’t waste your money on the rest!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh!! I can not say enough good things about this stuff!! I have used 3 gallons of this (gross, right!?) but it has SAVED my house from horrible odors of cat pee that we’re not eliminated by the store brands! It has save ME from awful embarrassment of having guests think my house smells like cat pee. Lordy! So thankful I found this! Btw, I don’t use a spray bottle, I pour it on! Actually, clean up the pee with it first. Then POUR it in and let it dry. When I use a black light I can watch the urine go from neon green to neutralized! So happy.
customer_reviews.author: Aegis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Had a sick cat who peed repeatedly on the carpet in one of our bedrooms. Nothing, absolutely nothing got rid of the smell. Vinager, pet carpet cleaners, etc. In a fit of frustrating, I ordered this as a last ditch effort to get rid of the smell before ripping out the carpet. Product arrived, follow the instructions and within two hours the smell or urine was gone. GONE! Amazing! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Use as directed and it will work
customer_reviews.text: SAVED MY EXPENSIVE LEATHER SOFAS. Very effective. Smell dissipates over time. The trick is to make sure it soaks in far enough to reach all of the cat urine. Used it on carpet and leather sofas after having already tried natures miracle with a rental carpet cleaner and not getting the desired results. I mixed this 50% with water and soaked the heck out of the trouble spots. Sofa no longer smells at all and the rug, which had been far more heavily soiled, is In great shape. Now a month later I can only smell the cleaner if I stick my nose into the carpet or under sofa cushions in the spots where I really doused it heavily.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, smell is GONE
customer_reviews.text: I was at my wits end. Cat pee, puppy pee and poo all concentrated into my extra living room. We were shampooing to no avail. I couldn’t even sit in the room next to this room. After the initial application the smell is gone. I have my home back. I can have someone over. Highly recommend. Buy the gallon don’t mess around with the small bottle. You’ll love this prouduct! I’m so happy! Well worth the money to not smell the pee any more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORKS
customer_reviews.text: This has been a god send in our house. We have a diabetic cat who pees on things and two other cats that are having a turf war and thus pee on things (SOOOOO much cat pee!). We love our furry little buggers but obviously dont enjoy the smell of cat urine. This really does neutralize the odors! Though RECOMMENDED TIP: Seemingly once you use a non-enzymatic cleaner on the spots, this will be rendered ineffective SO USE THIS FIRST AND ONLY.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Lifts stains, pet and otherwise, immediately. We use on carpet, including in our carpet cleaner, clothing and, the hardest task, to clean and freshen plastic reusable urinals. It removed a longstanding stain on our ironing board cover when nothing else did including Resolve carpet cleaner. The fragrance is perfect. We’ve ordered this many times. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Longines

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! Don't forget to dab it up
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is wonderful. I bought this when I was housetraining my puppy, and it saved my sanity. My whole house reeked of dog pee until I started applying this stuff. I went through many paper towels and started running out of heavy stuff to leave on top of it, but it was worth it!! I will note that it's crucial that you sweep up the area afterward as it tells you to in the instructions. Otherwise, you're left with a weird sour oatmeal smell.
customer_reviews.author: RiskyFish

customer_reviews.title: This seriously works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. My "little" boy is nearly 18 lbs and 2.5 ft long not counting his tail. He doesn't mean to miss the litter box, he's just too big. So we have a plastic outdoor rug I can easily spray down over the tile floor. Even neutered his spray is quite potent. This knocks it right out. He misses about twice a month. Before Rocco and Rosie's no amount of scrubbing and bleaching made the smell go away. Now I just spray it down (rug on floor), let it sit, then hose down the rug outside and mop the floor as usual and there is nothing but clean air. Thank you!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia McElroy

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried lots of enzyme treatments for pet urine. This stuff works. Just be sure to follow the directions. If you don't follow the directions, don't be surprised that it doesn't work. I've used it on dog beds that a new cat decided to revenge pee on. It took a repeat treatment because it wasn't a washable bed that could be placed in washer, but this stuff worked. I have geriatric dog that occasionally has accidents. I have washable pads that we keep on carpeted floors. I toss them in laundry with a cup of this treatment and it totally eliminates the odor. It works.
customer_reviews.author: ClaireW

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking - this is the one!🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.text: Ok so for literally YEARS I’ve tried EVERYTHING on the market. Most have a strong odor that tries to mask smells - and do nothing for stains. This product has virtually no odor and knocks out even the toughest stains. I bought the small bottle first to try it and ended up purchasing a gallon. Yes, it isn’t cheap but compared to all of the things you’ll buy that don’t work - totally worth every cent. Even removed every trace of cat urine odor. Seriously, it did. I rescue senior dogs and cats - I also enjoy having a clean home. I’ll continue to use and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Kang

customer_reviews.title: Really shines as a laundry pre-treatment for cat pee
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat who is in the process of adjusting to this whole "live in a house" thing, so I've had some recent chances to test this stuff out. It's good on floors, but the perfume is a bit heavy. Where it really shines, though, is as a laundry pre-treatment when the cat has peed on a washable rug or whatever. The difference between a rug washed in hot water, detergent, and bleach with vs. without this as pre-treatment is immense... and that's with *bleach* included in the mix. Very effective product. Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: CynBio

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, what a colossal waste of money. Should have bought the small bottle to try out. Wasted money on a product that only masks a smell for a day then the animals go right back to using the bathroom there. Overpowering smell like a dog groomer, over takes my wide open house and makes you choke on the smell. Really don’t have anything good to say about the product wish more than anything I could return but I didn’t use the product until the return window closed. Wouldn’t recommend to my worst enemy.
customer_reviews.author: Z Murray

customer_reviews.title: Bye, bye cat pee!!
customer_reviews.text: Our elderly cat peed in my husband's brand new running shoes. Without this product, we definitely would have had to throw the shoes away. I soaked them for about 2 hours in this solution and then washed the shoes and the smell is GONE!! Even after wearing the shoes and running and sweating in them, there is NO SMELL!! THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: Harry Potter Fan

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: The previous renters kept a litterbox in this closet pictured and evidently never cleaned it. It had the strongest urine smell even 3 months after we moved in. I tried many cleaning and odor eliminator products and it didn’t even weaken the smell. This product was highly recommended but the price tag was intimidating... what if it didn’t work!? Well, they have a money back guarantee for a reason. They know their product works. This urine was soaked into hardwood floors over several years. I applied a moderate amount of solution to the floors and let it dry for 2 hours. I’ve repeated twice and it seems the odor is gone. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd gallon I have had to by attempting to eliminate cat urine smell in my home. I finally located the cat urine on my folding blinds. Apparently, the boy cat I had was spraying the curtains from the window ledge! So now I am using this on my blinds. I'm putting it in a small spray bottle and spraying the heck out of everything; wiping it down and spraying again then letting it sit and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: Good for cat per
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for cleaning a very smelly cat pee stain out of a carpet. I really saturated the stain then wet vacuumed out the liquid. Then I ran the dehumidifier in the room for several days to get it completely dry. It did not discolor the rug. I still detect a very slight smell so I may do it all again. I do recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kayakkk

customer_reviews.title: Best enzymatic cleaner I've ever used for cat urine accident on carpeting. THE VERY BEST!
customer_reviews.text: My cat missed the cat box and I couldn't get that smell out of my carpet. I tried Natire's miracle. A whole gal. And that didn't help at all. Found many people Who said this stuff worked amazingly and that was the truth. It worked better than any product zive ever tried for cat urine. It had a strange minty smell that was really strong for about a week but no more cat pee smell and no more stain. I'd 100% order this for all future cat accidents. Won't waste money on Nature's Miracle from local Pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Logsdon

customer_reviews.title: The best stuff out there for pet urine
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of different products and this is by far the best. I also bought a black light to make sure it's really gone when you use it, and it really does eliminate all traces. If you've got pets that are either young or like to mark--this is your stuff. Do yourself a favor and buy one of the blacklight flashlights--you can really see everything, so you know what you missed.
customer_reviews.author: Dagny

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: There is a fragrance smell. Smells like Tiger Balm. I personally like the small of Tiger Balm so it doest bother me. Poured whole bottle on carpeted area in a small walk-in closet. Got rid of urine smell by the time it dried. Did leave a small discoloring on carpet. Carpet was light brown before, carpet has a pinkish/purplish tint now. Not a big deal to me since it’s in a closet. Fast shipping. Received the product within 2 days of ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Ja

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My cat peed on my favorite cloths 1x when she accidentally got locked in a room. I was devastated! After so research I came across this product. I figured it was worth a try & cheaper than replacing my clothes. It WORKED! After I soaked the clothes & let them sit overnight, I added some extra into the wash. After I dried them, there wasn’t even the faintest smell lingering. My son doesn’t like the smell- but it has done the job that I needed done on pet orders. I keep some in a squirt bottle for the armpit stains & smells on favorite clothes- something that often needs a quick spraying!
customer_reviews.author: John & Heather Walters

customer_reviews.title: Cleared urine smell out of concrete basement
customer_reviews.text: I bought a house and used this to remove the urine smell from the concrete basement floor. I sprayed the floor and laid painter's plastic sheeting on top to keep it wet. The downfall is price. I found a similar enzyme cleaner (Capture) at the hardware store for <$15/gal.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Best product out there!
customer_reviews.text: I did not know my male cat was peeing in random spots of my house. Long story short he went to the vet many times & nothing was wrong. It was just that he didn’t want to go in his litter box. I used Nature’s miracle product & others but the smell would not go away at all. So I finally caved and bought this gallon product. I wish I would have purchased it way sooner instead of wasting my money! The smell is completely gone after a one time cleaning!! I am so thankful for this product because my house does not smell awful anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I heartily recommend this product. It performs exactly as presented. My husband and I returned from a weekend trip to discover one of the cats had urinated on a brand new leather recliner (and all over the floor beneath it). I used the solution and every stain and odor was gone within a few minutes. At first I was reluctant to apply it to the leather but realized the chair would have to be tossed (and I wasn’t about to do that) so I took a chance. Perfect result! There are damned few products that completely live up to the claims made by the manufacturer- this is one that does.
customer_reviews.author: MJF

customer_reviews.title: Best product we've found!
customer_reviews.text: Our package did arrive on time. Your product is nothing short of amazing (in action and smell). We had a corner of our sofa that was peed (soaked) on by one of our cats. Several other products failed to eradicate the smell. We were facing the prospect of needing to get rid of and replace the couch. Treated the area with the pet stain & odor remover as directed. The smell in GONE! Your product is worth every penny we spent. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I had already tried several other enzyme products, so I was not expecting a lot. I have a new home, and there is a slate floor in laundry. Smelled stale and suspect since I arrived. I sprayed this in small area and later, noticed total fresh smell finally. I then sprayed entire area, and left it for a day. It’s now fresh and crisp and clean days later—the entire room, and staying that way. Wish I had found this product first. I believe this is a USA made product also.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: This stuff freaking works. We have 3 dogs ages 2,5 and 14 and there's always been accidents especially with the oldest one. We get our carpets cleaned twice a year and you can tell the smell is still there. This time we decided to give his stuff a try we went around cleaning he areas and then the next day we had our carpets cleaned and that lingering urine smell was 100% gone ! The scent is not that bad unless you do your whole house, but even then you can just crack open a window !
customer_reviews.author: Chu

customer_reviews.title: THE ONLY ONE TO GET FOR CAT OWNERS
customer_reviews.text: We have two older male cats that like to pee on things when they’re upset or I let the litter go for a couple of days. Cat urine is nasty and this stuff is the only one that works. It saved me from replacing carpet in a bedroom and a fabric love seat. Don’t waste your time with Natural Wonder or anything you can buy at the grocery store. This stuff is expensive but this stuff is the truth.
customer_reviews.author: Flumshid

customer_reviews.title: Superior product; do NOT skip steps
customer_reviews.text: I've used many other products in the past for dog urine on carpet, but this product by far is the best I've used. I'm just upset I didn't discover it sooner. I usually don't like extra emails from sellers, but seller provided detailed instructions for use and explained importance of diluting process to enhance product effectiveness. Do NOT skip that step. I followed the instructions given and found very successful results.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: No more smelly pet urine!
customer_reviews.text: We were having problems with a stressed out cat that was urinating outside of the litter box and used this product to clean up. It has worked great! I don't get hit in the face with the smell when I walk in this room any more and I don't believe our cat has returned to the previous spots that she was going on before using this. Easy to use and has a pleasant smell. If you're considering getting a product this worked great and I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kim W.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I used to always use Nature's Miracle and would swear buy it, but last few times I have purchased it, it did not work like it used to. Bought this and it worked much better. Also, the odor of this product is much better. The only reason I am giving it 4 stars is even though it reduced the cat urine smell, it did not completely eradicate it after multiple, heavy uses. It also removed the stain and left my carpet looking perfectly fine. I've had many cats and my share of experience with cat urine and ability of products to treat the issue, depending on severity, etc... Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on old stains
customer_reviews.text: Someone bought us a flashlight with a black light in it. Of course, I used the black light and was shocked and saddened, really, by the glowing pee stains on the carpet. It seemed like it was everywhere! Looked at Amazon and found this product. The reviews seemed great so we made a purchase. Sadly, it does not work on old pee stains. I followed directions and have used it more than one time on the same stain. Nothing. The best thing I can say about it is that the scent of the product is not bad. If you think you'll get old pee stains out of your carpet you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Highly Effective!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product (along with a UV Black Light) in order to treat our attic. Our house is approx 25 years old with both rolled and loose insulation and over the years we've had to deal with both Roof Rats and Squirrels. I spot treated problem areas identified by the UV light, and then did a general spray throughout most of the attic (some areas are a bit too difficult to access). As part of the cleaning/rinsing of the bottle sprayer, I sprayed the now diluted liquid up at our vented soffits. The product worked GREAT! The attic is now essentially odor-free! Even the diluted product worked great on the soffits! Definitely 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Ray A.

customer_reviews.title: Clearly superior to all the rest!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I gave an elderly cat who has started peeing in the heat vents in the floor. Just imagine the smell. Every time the heat flows out. I tried nature's miracle and odoban which both had worked before- but not on the heat vents. Thus stuff cleared up the smell within minutes in two of the vents and with a repeat application on the 3rd. Buy it!!! Worth every penny. Clearly superior to all the others.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Clark

customer_reviews.title: It works !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great !!!!! I was so impressed the very first time I applied it to a dog urine spot I put a paper towel over the spot And within minutes the paper towel has soaked up a lot of the urine from the rug And within a couple of hours the spot was clean and no odor I’ll be buying this product again and have recommended it to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Nancy p

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a fan of enzymatic cleaners for many, many years and through many, many critters and have used the standbys with varying success. I was desperate and had run out of my usual choice. Checked Amazon ratings and thought why not. Well....this product has removed stains from cat puke that I could NOT get out!!!! Gone!!!! I got an awesome black light and did an end to end search of the house.....😣. I set out to get them all....and I did!! I ordered the gallon refill. It smells nice and really works fantastically well!!! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kilees bud

customer_reviews.title: Holly s**t it works amazing
customer_reviews.text: I can not say this enough, AMAZING!!!! I have tried everything the local walmart sells to try to get cat spray smell out of the carpets and nothing worked. Rocco & Roxie didn't cover the smell, it removed it. Gone. It has been 2 weeks and not a trace of cat smell has returned. I just ordered 2 more gallons to keep on hand incase anymore pet accidents occur. I know it is pricey but it is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Best cat urine odor eliminator
customer_reviews.text: We have been trying to remove cat urine from new carpet & pad for months using multiple products. This product is the first that looks like will finally remove the odor. Customer service was fantastic giving us tips on best way to proceed with our problem which is probably deep in the thick pad & subfloor & required multiple applications. This is the best product I’ve used for cat urine removal!
customer_reviews.author: das369

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Effective stuff
customer_reviews.text: Has a pleasant minty-bubble-gum odor while wet. I do think this is the most effective enzyme treatment I've tried. One location I put it on had been repeatedly urinated on by the cats, but after the second liberal application, I could no longer smell the urine (and after it dries, the bubble gum smell is light unless you put your nose right down to it). I am wondering - maybe if someone at Rocco and Roxie is monitoring this they can reply - since this compound includes bacterial agents, does it have a fairly short shelf life?
customer_reviews.author: Ellen S.

customer_reviews.title: Spendy....
customer_reviews.text: I feel that this is WAY over-priced but holy moly does it ever do the job!! I had a horrible cat urine odor on my carpet downstairs from one naughty feline & it just would not go away with anything I tried, white vinegar, other enzymatic cleaners, my carpet shampooer, everything!! This stuff arrived and I soaked the carpet in it on the area and within seconds the odor was gone!!!! This stuff is seriously amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: SLM

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a mildly incontinent OK Dane. Luckily(?), he's contained his accidents to just one room. This product removed the stains and odor when nothing else did! It has a smell like maybe cinnamon or something. Totally not offensive just lingers for a little bit. Granted, we are on our 3rd gallon though. :) Make sure you follow their directions and use enough product to saturate the area. Don't skimp! It works!!!
customer_reviews.author: DaneDame

customer_reviews.title: Gets Rid of the Smell Completely!
customer_reviews.text: Rochard's Wife, "I bought this product based on overall recommendations. I can confirm the recommendations to be accurate. The cat had a UTI and went potty in the unused bonus rooms. Once I noticed the damage I set about cleaning, shampooing, scrubbing but the smell lingered. Several days later, I discovered this product on Amazon and ordered it post-haste! I bought the gallon jug and pretty much poured it on the soiled areas to do its thing. I did not blot, I just poured it and let it air dry. I happily confirm the smell is gone, the hubby is happy, and the cat got an antibiotic shot. All has ended well."
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of that ammonia smell
customer_reviews.text: Some people complained about the smell. I have to say I loved it. We have 2 cats that started using the bathroom in a corner of a room. I tried all kinds of cleaners with no luck. The room started to get a strong smell. It was hardwood, but I poured directly on the spot. I have yet to find if this fixes the issue, but the room smells a whole let better than cat urine. I was expecting this over powering cleaner smell from other reviews, but in my opinion it smells great; much better than cat urine and has a clean smell.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rojas

customer_reviews.title: It honestly works (not just a glorified air freshener)
customer_reviews.text: The price is high but I only used about half a bottle to clean a 256 sf laundry room that my male cat decided was a litter box(I wasn’t sure where he peed so I cleaned all of it. I had tried a lots of products before and nothing would work for more than a day or two. I used this product liberally and scrubbed my tile floors that had unsealed grout and the smell is gone. It’s been 5 months now and I still don’t smell anything and I’m very sensitive to smells
customer_reviews.author: rhenna

customer_reviews.title: Jury’s still out! Dry house now, damp weather carpet may get replaced😢
customer_reviews.text: Did not completely remove odor, thought it did at first but still crept through. I redid it multiple times waited days to make sure it dried and ended up calling a carpet cleaning company to clean out both the cat and the cleaner odor. I needed it gone for the Christmas. Damp days it still smells combo cat and cleaner.The scent was pleasant enough but way too much of a good thing. I however did use it in my granddaughters laundry as her cat soiled a whole pile of dirty clothes piled in her bathroom and it completely took that odor out.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for pet odors and stains. It has worked great, and I would definitely recommend it for those purposes. I have also used it in our outside trash can which can get pretty nasty at times. It has really helped to eliminate the many different odors that it can house over time. It also has a fresh aroma that makes everything you thought couldn't be tolerated, pleasant and easily tolerable. Great for any areas that need freshening and a clean aroma.
customer_reviews.author: S Jones

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff is Magic
customer_reviews.text: My basement was horrible. Previous owner had let the dog pee everywhere, the carpet and baseboards were saturated. This caused my cat to go a little crazy and pee everywhere! I ripped the carpet and baseboard out but is still smelled HORRIBLY. I treated the areas with this twice and then scrubbed the floors, and the smell is gone. Plus my cat stopped peeing outside the litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's expensive, and doesn't smell very nice, but it works very well
customer_reviews.text: The smell is not great, but it does work with eliminating cat urine. I used it in the wash. I poured it directly in the washer, started the cycle, once the water was in I stopped the washer for 1 hour, and allowed it to soak, then finished the cycle as normal. It worked with every load, and I never had to repeat. It was a very expensive way to remove the smell, as I wasn't exactly sure what pieces of clothing the smell was on, I washed everything, so I used nearly the whole bottle. But now nothing has a urine smell, and the cat hasn't urinated in the laundry hampers since.
customer_reviews.author: Andréa

customer_reviews.title: Works !
customer_reviews.text: Price is the only negative aspect. I bought the gallon size because the smaller spray bottle is gone after a few larger spots. It killed the order immediately, I have not had a chance to deep clean with a machine so I can’t really comment on that aspect. In my case it arrived the day after I ordered it 👍
customer_reviews.author: Some guy

customer_reviews.title: Best product I have found for cat urine
customer_reviews.text: We have issues with one of our cats getting UTIs and she pees on the couch when she has one. We were considering replacing the couch until we found this. I soaked it into the 3 spot of the couch. The next day I used a professional carpet cleaner I rented from Home Depot for $30 with this product to shampoo the entire couch. I used 1/3 water and 2/3 R&R cleaner. I probably could have gotten away with 1/2 and 1/2. I was skeptical but it worked so much better than I expected. I also got a cover for the couch. We are now smell free and I am so happy I found this.
customer_reviews.author: SarahLouise

customer_reviews.title: Really Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to remove dog urine from the sides of chairs and on the carpet. The company sent me an email on how to maximize the use of the product. Their suggestions really helped. The odor is gone., The black light shows the urine is gone - including old stains. The smell is a bit strong - I don't mind it but my husband isn't a fan. However, it's better than the smell of dog urine! Also, it dissipates as it dries.
customer_reviews.author: Cnbushy

customer_reviews.title: Use with Caution! Highly Irritating.
customer_reviews.text: Unable to use this product. The fumes from Rocco & Roxie are so irritating they induce severe burning of the throat and sinuses, and coughing to the point of vomiting. I had to step outside until the fumes had cleared the house. Use with caution!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hester

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I have a GSD and my mom has 3 Chihuahuas and an endless supply of cats. THIS. STUFF. WORKS. Period. It's now my favorite product to plug to all my pet owning friends. Heck, even if you don't own pets but your grandma has a little accident on the couch every now and then. This is the stuff you need.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: If you have a cat you need this!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product several times. It really does work well. Gave some to my daugh I have ordered this several times. I had a poor old cat who made messes and then two of my daughters cats stayed with me for several months. This product really helped with the nasty odors from cats.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Sudsy film left behind.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a fantastic product at first. Then my friends and I have noticed where I sprayed the product it left a soapy, sticky residue. If you notice when you spray it soap suds will come up if you rub it in , then it becomes sticky and catches dirt leaving a dirty mark from foot traffic on your rug. I did use vinegar to cut the residue . It helped. I will have it steamed now.
customer_reviews.author: Coco 20

customer_reviews.title: Only thing we've found that works
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been the only thing that we've found that works and keeps the cats from returning. We tried Natures with good cleaning but the cats returned. We've been using this for about 18 months with great results. The cats haven't returned to the same spot once. We did notice that after about 6 months or so the smell returned faintly on our couch (It didn't seem strong enough to be new) however we resprayed and it was gone again. Overall, very happy with the product and will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AvidBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of the cat pee smell!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this to treat carpet where a cat pee'd. I was really worried about it becoming a horrible habit. I cot a blue light flashlight for less than $15 and treated all spots on carpet liberally with this stuff and have not had a problem with repeat offenses since I treated the carpet. Thanks to you my cats will live another day and hopefully will never pee on the carpet again!
customer_reviews.author: annacatmc

customer_reviews.title: Miracle cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I swear by it. I have 5 animals. Two of them had urinary issues so of course accidents happened and this stuff saved my life. I’ll never use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: amanda harr

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing product EVER! I have 4 dogs (3 are elderly) and I dig sit. After using this most amazing product, my house does Not stink! I’ve tried everything & this is the only thing that eliminates stains & odors.
customer_reviews.author: AngieZ

customer_reviews.title: The best neutralizer for nasty messes
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is seriously the best! I had been dealing with my pup's urinary tract infection and her accidents on three different rugs. Sadly, she had both blood and bacteria in her urine as well. Nature's Miracle usually does the trick and has for the past 13 years, but not on this. I tried Woolite's Pet and Odor solution and also steamed my rug with Hoover Pet Shampoo. Nothing helped except for Rocco & Roxie! My rug smells fresh with no hint of the mess we had on it. I even checked with a blacklight.
customer_reviews.author: K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Saved us from removing a hardwood floor!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible dog urine stains and odor in a rental house. We tried this product because of the money-back claim. We had scrubbed the floor, put on two coats of Kilz oil based primer and covered it with vinyl planks. The odor was still horrible. New tenants would not move in. We applied the odor and stain eliminator twice and scrubbed walls, floors, ceiling and trim. Wow! Odor gone! New tenants pleased and moved in. Very pleased. Well worth the price. It works! D. Lyon
customer_reviews.author: Newbie 1 Canobie

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Product!
customer_reviews.text: Total lifesaver!!! This took the pee smell out of our carpet and so far (fingers crossed) we haven't had any repeat markings! Our cat still wanders around near the spots she peed on, but it's been over a week without any further accidents. The smell isn't bad, it's kind of a mint bubble gum smell. We made sure to totally soak the carpeting we were dealing with, so we went through a gallon on the first day and ordered a second to have on hand. So thankful for something that takes the smell away!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: In the attached picture, you'll find the spot where my dog and all of the dogs that visited my house decided to leave their ... erm... "calling cards." I have since banned all dogs from the premises. This particular picture was taken after two treatments using Rocco & Roxxie. Urine stains still show up under the UV light. At the very best, this product just sort of smeared around some of the stains, but they remained intact and mostly unaffected. I will be asking for my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Keith L. Goode

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is a good product, I am insured if it is really any better than other products that I have used in the past that claim the same odor elimination and cleaning power and are a little cheaper. It is a good product, worth the cost, it did the job as I hoped it would. So I will say I recommend this product, I also recommend other products similar to it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I rescued a cat that was under 2 years old and in need of neutering. He had began spraying before his vet visit. I tried a few different products with very strong scents but didn't help take away the smell completely. This completely removed any smell and it has a very pleasant scent that's not at all overwhelming. Kitty has stopped spraying and no lingering bad scents.
customer_reviews.author: Atamb

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell good, but I think it does work.
customer_reviews.text: I think it cleans and works as advertised, but I really don't like the way it smells. And it lingers. But it still smells better than old piss I reckon.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Earns the hype, a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after trying many different popular brands. After researching and reading all the reviews on Amazon, I decided to try it, but was skeptical. Shortly after purchasing, I was sent an email from the company thanking me and boasting about their product. So after using the product I was very pleased. My family absolutely loved the scent and the stains came up. Some old stubborn stains took a few times cleaning for better results, but the smell is totally gone. I am now a supporter and fan of Rocco and Roxie. And I tell everyone about it.
customer_reviews.author: A18045

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We just got a brand new couch and our dog likes to mark furniture when we leave him in the house alone. I used this product as soon as I saw a wet spot and it worked great. There is no urine stain or smell left on the couch. The product also has a pleasant smell instead of other cleaners that smell chemically. I would definitely recommend this if you’ve got a dog that likes to mark furniture too.
customer_reviews.author: Laciejay

product_meta.title: Rocco & Roxie Supply Professional Strength Stain and Odor Eliminator, Enzyme-Powered Pet Odor and Stain Remover for Dogs and Cat Urine, Spot Carpet Cleaner for Small Animal.
feature_bullets: CERTIFIED GENTLE AND SAFE Chlorine free and color safe. Safe to use around pets and children. No hazardous propellants, no residue left behind. So gentle it’s been Certified Safe for all carpets, earning the Seal of Approval by the trusted Carpet and Rug Institute (CRI)

ELIMINATES STAINS, ODORS AND RESIDUE If it’s gross, it’s gone. Not just the stain, but the stink. From stinky yellow pet urine and feces to vomit and other organic spills, our professional strength formula tackles them all.
EVERY SURFACE, EVERY TIME For use on carpets, floors, furniture, clothing, litter boxes, kennels, carriers, all pet living and sleeping areas—anywhere stains happen.

ENZYME ACTIVATED The key is getting to the problem deep-down. This spray contains natural enzymatic bacteria that are activated on contact with odors and stains, feeding on ammonia crystals and organic matter until they are completely eliminated.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED An Amazon best seller—for a reason. If your stains and odors aren’t gone, neither is your money. We’ll refund it in full.
